text: Percival Norman Barton (9 September 1888 – 6 December 1912) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Richmond in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He died aged 24 in a motor cycle accident in Melbourne. == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1888 births Category:1912 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Richmond Football Club players Category:Motorcycle road incident deaths Category:Road incident deaths in Victoria (Australia)
title: Percy Barton (Australian footballer)
